website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for smaller boys and those just learning the basics of riding a bike.
pros: Has features suitable for kids new to bike riding, including a handle bar shield, hand and coaster brakes, training wheels, and 16-inch wheels
cons: The fun accessories like the odometer and noise maker seem poorly made and have the tendency to break

customer_reviews.title: False Description!
customer_reviews.text: Shopping for a bike for my 7yr old son after comparing with others we seen online, we thought this was the perfect bike for him.. 1st issues is that it doe not come with the muffler exhaust that it claims to have listed in description and on photos.. 2nd issue is the quality is just not there... peddles broke and the Rev grip would get stuck and not work properly...I send it back still awaiting credit from Manufacturer/Amazon..Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Consuelo S.

customer_reviews.title: Very cool bike and my son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This bike arrived and its perfect! It was very easy to put together. I spent a total of maybe 30 minutes attaching the sit, wheels, and handle bar. I then needed to tune the bike which wasn't hard at all. The rev attachment is very cool and my son LOVES it. I highly recommend this bike!
customer_reviews.author: ergibson83

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to do alot of adjustments
customer_reviews.text: Overall a decent kids bike!...... but assembling it kinda sucked, plastic parts were warped pretty bad had to use a heat gun to straighten them out and every factory nut was insanely over torqued!!! Had to take entire factory assembled piece apart, grease properly and re torque properly. I thought for sure the crank bearings were busted but after some love i got everything moving freely. Good bike just be prepared to adjust crank, wheel, and fork bearings. I expected better from the manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together and had him on it in ...
customer_reviews.text: Found one at Toys R Us going out of business sale, but the seat was torn and it was the last one. My grandson loves Hot Wheels so I wanted the branded bike. Its his first "bike" and he loves it. It was easy to put together and had him on it in no time. The price was better than Toys R Us going out of business sale (no wonder why they went out of business) it was a few buck more than walmart but the delivery was good. I am not a big fan of the special handle grip it seems kind of loose, I wish they would give you an option to have two regular grips.
customer_reviews.author: PDM777

customer_reviews.title: Just for looks
customer_reviews.text: Really cool looking bike but not made well. The pedals fell off on the first ride and were made with plastic threads that wore down while my little guy was pedalling so now they won't go back on at all because you can't screw them on. After a makeshift repair to the pedals the spokes started to pop off the wheel and flop around. Just pretty flimsy and its too bad because its very cool looking.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Received 2 left pedals!!!
customer_reviews.text: I value customer reviews when making a purchase, and noticed some negative reviews on missing/defective parts for this bike, but decided to roll the dice and purchase. Well, I had a very disappointed 7 year old (on his birthday) when we couldn't finish the assembly due to receiving two LEFT pedals. The pedals are not interchangeable so we were left with a non-funtional birthday bike. After contacting Amazon customer service, who are amazing, we have a replacement bike on the way. I'm only giving it 3 stars due to the negligence on the quality assurance of the manufacturer, but the bike looks really nice, with cool decals. My 7 year also seems to like the motorbike sounds!
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Missing the Turbo spoke on both the bikes I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: The bike is pretty good for the money, But i ordered 2 of them, and neither had the turbo spoke Advertised on this page. So if that's a feature you want it for, you're probably gonna be disappointed. I kept the bike since it was a Christmas gift for my kid, But she was very disappointed about the missing feature.
customer_reviews.author: richard ditommaso

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike for my grandson for Christmas. It was missing parts and the stickers on the front were a mess. Do not but. Someone sent this out knowing it was missing parts and that the hot wheels stickers were to say the least disappointing. I spent 5 hours searching for the parts for the front wheel to be attached on the day after Christmas. Great job guys! Never again! Why doesn't Amazon add negative stars
customer_reviews.author: mnkypzzl

customer_reviews.title: This bike went together very easy and seems to be well made
customer_reviews.text: This bike went together very easy and seems to be well made. I did not have any of the problems I read about on the other 18in bikes sold on amazon. Things like the front wheel not going on because the front fork is bent or welding incorrectly, etc. This bike comes with a kick stand but no training wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Derek B

customer_reviews.title: Good value bike
customer_reviews.text: Got this during prime day for a good price. Put this together for my son and it feels pretty sturdy. No issues assembling, but did have to adjust the front hand brake. I had to do this on my own bike, so I think it's fairly common especially if you order online and have to attach the front wheel yourself. The only down side is that I wish they included a normal hand grip on the right side once you get tired of the clunky electronic grip with the sound effects.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Great!
customer_reviews.text: Got this bike and also ordered the additional assembly service provided by an Amazon vendor. The service guy arrived a little before the scheduled time. The assembly was quick, the bike was up and running in a few and my son rode it to school immediately. A few months later, it is well ridden, sturdy and still great! I think my 7-y-o will outgrow it.
customer_reviews.author: Praying Mother

customer_reviews.title: Great looking bike
customer_reviews.text: Great looking bike. the RPM gauge is connected to what is a fake plastic dirtbike throttle. There for when you younger one goes hard his wrist is always able to move. So yes the bike technically only came with ONE REAL RUBBER BIKE GRIP. Also it is not to blame the company but the training wheels are cheap. I know the training wheels are suppose to come off at this age but its not possible with this particular one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally Unacceptable, Highly Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Assembling the bike on Christmas Eve and there are NO HANDLEBARS included in the box!!! How do you explain to a five year old that Santa forgot to finish the bike?!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. Not a snap to assemble but definitely not hard. Just could be easier. Really nice bike though. Only thing that could be a negative is the right handle is a turning one to vroom vroom the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decided to assemble the bike Midnight Christmas Eve in order ...
customer_reviews.text: Decided to assemble the bike Midnight Christmas Eve in order to surprise my 6 year old son with the bike but came with no handlebar among other parts..
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Strong bike and super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This looks and works just like advertised!! It is a huge hit with my 4 yr old for his birthday! He LOVES it! It looks great, super durable and was easy to put together!! My kid is rough and tough and this has proven to last against him!
customer_reviews.author: Brit Konsela

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily!
customer_reviews.text: This bike is very cool. Unfortunately, the part that makes it so enjoyable for a young boy breaks easily. The right handle cranks, the gauge moves, lights flash, and the engine revs. Awesome, right? Well, it's not so great when the child falls and the bike lands on the right handle. It only took one fall and the lights no longer work, the engine doesn't rev and the gauge doesn't move. 😞
customer_reviews.author: Aiden heath

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed! Recieved bike and assembled with no problems. Seems like a solid bike. However, both rims are horribly out of balance/true. Took it to my local bike shop, and it costs $50 to true both rims! That's almost what I paid! Shop encouraged me to return it but I don't want to go through the hassle of disassembly and shipping. Would like compensation.
customer_reviews.author: VJDetroit

customer_reviews.title: The bike is so cute and was very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The bike is so cute and was very easy to assemble. The speedometer piece makes cool sounds when you push the button and it also makes an engine revving sound if you twist the handle back (just like a real motorcycle). The orange stripe on the tire and graffiti seat are great accents that make the bike very visually appealing. I am so excited to give this to my 4 year old son for Christmas. I would suggest this bike for a child in the 4-7 year old age range based on the 16-inch size.
customer_reviews.author: Gingerdarlington

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bike!
customer_reviews.text: It is a bery nice bike. My kid loved it taking a star off because the product had abrasions on the lowr part of the frame. The packaging was good so I am assuming the scratches/Abrasions exisited when the product was shipped but all in all my kid is in love with this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Great chose
customer_reviews.text: This bike is the “bomb” my son turned 4yrs old yesterday and loves hot wheel cars. This bike with the motor sounds is perfect. He grew out of his 12” bike so for his birthday I bought him this 14” 😍♥️🥰🌹❤️
customer_reviews.author: kent

customer_reviews.title: Great bike! Horrible customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered without peddles which is probably the most important part. Contacted the manufacturer for parts and they told me it could be months before they could send them had to buy after market peddles. Other than that my son was very happy. Would give five stars if it wasn’t for the lousy customer service by the manufacturer and the missing peddles.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this bike. We bought it for my 6 year old. It’s his first big boy bike. Was easy to put together. Training wheels are decent. He loves it. The only thing that we couldn’t get to work properly is the front hand brake. But he uses the other brake so it’s not a big deal for us.
customer_reviews.author: littlesyd85

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made with engineering defects
customer_reviews.text: This bike is pretty cheaply made, with obvious engineering defects (not shipping related). The hole that's drilled through the top of the front fork to hold the brake is not even drilled straight, thus the brakes can never possibly line up even with the wheels evenly. I was also disappointed that the plastic rev handle could not be removed without buying a replacement handle. My 5 year old will probably like it, but I know this bike will require extra effort from me to keep running.
customer_reviews.author: G. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good Bike for kids - needs a bit of effort to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is a good sturdy bike and my 5 year old boys love it. They are not easy to assemble and tool me 1 hour each (I bought 2). But overall happy with build quality and durability. I can recommend this - just know that you would need to put in the effort to get this running.
customer_reviews.author: Anu

customer_reviews.title: Missing part of decorative plastic.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this bike. The instructions weren't great, but if you've got basic knowledge of bikes then you will probably be able to figure it out. The decorative plastic plate on the front is missing one of the velcro straps so we can't attach it to the bike, so that was disappointing. Doesn't affect the function of the bike, but doesn't look like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: 2 left pedals.
customer_reviews.text: It shipped with 2 left pedals. We noticed at the very end of the assembly. You can imagine how disappointed a kid would be when that happens. We both cried. I think I cried more than he did.
customer_reviews.author: VMan2001

customer_reviews.title: 7yr old boy very happy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 year old sons birthday. I was nervous about the assembly but I was surprised I got it finished in about an hour. It came with most of the assembly complete so I just followed the instructions to complete the rest. He has been outside riding all day! The Rev grip is a nice addition. He loves the sound!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Winner

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for the money!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yr old grandson loved this bike! He picked it out himself for his birthday! Great price and very sturdy! Believe me he is hard on bikes! I would buy him another when he needs a bigger one! Your boy want be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Great minus the moving handle
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son's 5th birthday and he likes it a lot. My complaint is the "throttle" handle which moves backward like an actual throttle when he grabs the handles which is uncomfortable for him. Gonna try to switch it out with a regular handle.
customer_reviews.author: michie

customer_reviews.title: Great bike but the hand grip sticks all the time now
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his bike he rides it everyday. We have had it for 5 months now and it still looks brand new. The only issue is the hand grip that makes the sounds has been sticking everytime it's used so it has to be manually turned off. So minus 1 star for that
customer_reviews.author: James haberlin

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Seat, otherwise great
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this bike! He is so happy with the style and the “throttle” noise. I wish it had a kickstand and was disappointed that the way it was packaged damaged the seat.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Win win
customer_reviews.text: I stalked this bike for 2 months because it kept running out of stock on amazon and the stores....the bike is great! My son loves the engine sounds that comes from the handles....was not hard to put together and amazon price is the lowest I’ve seen
customer_reviews.author: Miracle Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: over all the bike is nice and works well
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because there was a missing bearing in the stem and the it was over tightened. I happen to have a spare one from an old bike (lucky that I had that) so my son could ride the bike as it would not turn. over all the bike is nice and works well. Also the bike looks just like the one pictured so A+ to that.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged and the company will not reply to my trouble ticket
customer_reviews.text: The bike is what it is, inexpensive and good for a beginner. My complaint is that the bike took over a month to arrive, and when it finally got here it was damaged. The phone number in the warranty book is automated and will hang up on you (as designed) after the recorded message. I registered the bike online and created a support ticket and the company is not responding to that. I am a day or two away from returning the product through amazon, I hesitate because my 5 yr old will be without a bike.
customer_reviews.author: Ibis Myers

customer_reviews.title: Good bike
customer_reviews.text: This bike held up well, I was a little disappointed at first because the training wheels seemed a bit weak, but as time passed I realized they actually helped my son learn to ride without them, training wheels are not sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Wiljay 6

customer_reviews.title: Broken Garbage
customer_reviews.text: The only gift my 4 yr old wanted for Christmas. Went to assemble it and the damn thing is broken. Chain cover shattered, missing kickstand, left peddle is stripped, and the break spring is so bent the breaks won’t work. Can’t express my disappointment and dissatisfaction. Trying to figure out how to ease the disappointment when Santa’s bike is delivered unrideable
customer_reviews.author: J. Powell

customer_reviews.title: We know now to check things better ahead of time rather than just before Christmas day
customer_reviews.text: We had to immediately replace the handgrips when the bike arrived as the plastic novelty handgrip was moving to much and making it unsafe. I attempted to tighten the handgrip but it did not stop the slipping. The handbrake was not functional on arrival as well. We know now to check things better ahead of time rather than just before Christmas day. Since we needed this for Christmas, we performed the necessary fixes on our own and our son was able to ride the bike on Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new bike. His last one was horrible for him as the training wheels weren't solid enough. This bike is perfect. I thought the sound effects were a nice touch
customer_reviews.author: garreth

customer_reviews.title: Broken bike broken five year olds heart
customer_reviews.text: This bike is so cute however once we put it together it made a clicking sound. We trouble shouted for weeks. Couldn’t find the problem. Then the peddles locked and ball bearings poured out. The whole bike is unrideable and my sons heart is broken. Also the throttle stopped working after a few weeks. We bought in June and he hasn’t been able to ride since September (only 3 months). I am sadly dissatisfied and hope to get our money back. We paid about $90!
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Great first bike gift.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved the this bike. It is his first bike and he couldn’t wait to ride it. Now we can’t get him off it. Great first bike!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Seemed easy to assemble. Decent quality. The sound box seems quirky but other than that it’s a great bike especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Denyel

customer_reviews.title: This is a fun bike for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun bike for kids. It has great colors and graphics and wasn't very difficult to put together. It seems to be holding up well even with a bunch of rough boys riding it. When you twist the right handlebar it turns on the race car engine sound. My only complaint is that it doesn't spring back on its own to turn the sound off so I often find it on my front porch continuously revving the engine. It's still great quality and a fun bike.
customer_reviews.author: Holly White

customer_reviews.title: Reviews should tell you all you need to know
customer_reviews.text: Instruction manual was terrible, if you have the correct tools and look at all the pieces, you should be able to figure it out. Just like other reviews, the handle that makes the noises was broken immediately, when you turn it on, its almost impossible to turn it off, this was known when I ordered it. It is a perfect fit for my 5 year old and has given no further problems at this time, just need to replace the useless handle grip that is an annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great bike. The hot rod theme and vroom revving ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bike. The hot rod theme and vroom revving handlebar was a big hit with my 4 yr old. 14" bikes are an essential transition for my kid moving up from hist 12" balance bike. He outgrew that, but still too short to ride a 16" bike he has, and so we got him this Dynacraft. The only thing that could be better, IMO, is that the fork are too wide; when screw on tight, it kinda had to bend inward a bit. It's not a deal breaker, as this can be easily fixed by adding a washer on each side of the hub.
customer_reviews.author: sleepysauruz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My son who is 6 Loved this. It's pretty easy to put together and omg he Loved it. He is 6 and a tall big boy so it's why we went with this size. Probably not for the average 6yr old.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hotwheels Bike
customer_reviews.text: Great value Easy to assemble Has some cool Hotwheels type features on it The sounds were great fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid, first bike
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size bike for my son who is 3 1/2 yrs. and 37" tall. Took less than an hour to put together and adjust to his size. Instructions are for multiple bikes. Instructions for this bike start on page 52 "Single Speed and BMX". Jump to page 91 for brake adjustment. Odd that there's no front or rear reflectors on this bike. This bike was easier to put together than a lot of other bikes I've assembled. Overall great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: R. Read

customer_reviews.title: Turbospoke missing on 2 bikes I ordered
customer_reviews.text: As others said, if you're looking for the Turbospoke, it seems the bike doesn't have it anymore. I ordered 2, neither came with it. But other than that, the bike itself looks a solid one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description. No handbrake. Terrible shipping
customer_reviews.text: Overall the bike is fine, quality seems decent for a kids bike. The Listing Title on Amazon is misleading, however, as the bicycle did NOT come with a hand brake as described. Also, shipping with UPS through Amazon was an absolute nightmare. UPS is hot garbage and you can’t even speak to a worthwhile human after 6+ hours of trying (ask me how I know).
customer_reviews.author: John santaniello

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: Was 4 my grandson went together easy he hoped right on with the biggest smile I've ever seen on his face
customer_reviews.author: Jason Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this bike! It came in a box, in another huge box. It has a rev handle bar that makes noice like a racecar. The training wheels it came with are quality not flimsy. I don’t know how well the work bc he doesn’t need them. But they seem really well built. The colors are very vibrant on the bike. Very well built for the money.
customer_reviews.author: MSmith

customer_reviews.title: Loves it
customer_reviews.text: 5 year old son loves his bike! He likes the sound effects he can make while riding too
customer_reviews.author: Hana Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Good bike  great design
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike. Perfect size for my 4 year toddler he is so happy using it, the only thing is heavy for The little one to use it But it a good bike
customer_reviews.author: Alma Oriz

customer_reviews.title: Hot Wheels bike Fun
customer_reviews.text: Great surdy bike for my 5 yr old grandson who loves Hot Wheels! The coloring and the sounds it makes made this a great hit!
customer_reviews.author: Christy-holly Piszkiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Good deal !!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome my son will love this got it for my 7 yearold for Christmas fast shipping good deal thanks Amazon😍😊
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but not worth
customer_reviews.text: Worst customer service. Manual provided is not clear, same for all models, sizes and when asked for help, customer service sent some random 30 sec videos for other cycles found in Google which are not even clear or helpful. Bought it because there weren't any other 14 inch options online and okay product, it is very pricey. Product quality is not worth for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sri

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We ended up having to return this Item, Parts were missing, the frame was scratched and the brake would not close properly. This was a gift for our grandson, luckily we assembled it before Christmas and avoided his disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: I have gotten 3 of these bikes now and all ...
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten 3 of these bikes now and all 3 have had something wrong with them. I will be returning once again and not getting a replacement. The cheap plastic handle bar that makes the voice has broken on two of the bikes and will not stop making noises. Also on two of the bikes the back wheel turns very hard and makes it very difficult for my son to pedal. We even tried loosening the back jam nut to try and stop that but it did not help. Do not buy this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Herzberger

customer_reviews.title: Not great training wheels
customer_reviews.text: Great bike, but not very sturdy training wheels. One broke off after just a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Havent even assembled it yet.. I took it out the box only to find out that it is missing a handle cushion on the right side wtf!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Garibay

customer_reviews.title: Good bike but plastic chain guard :-/
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like that the chain guard is plastic. It’s a little close at one part with the chain guard and you can’t do anything to fix that. Reflector broke during assembly. Wish both color options came with training wheels. But everything else seems good and kiddos love them.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Barrings and pedal got Broken.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this bike after seeing the reviews. My child had used it hardly for a month or two. But the bike was started giving frequent problems with the chain and then now with ball barrings were out. This is not a working bike anymore. So sad that this got ended that quickly. Don't know yet on the service or warranty, how that works.
customer_reviews.author: Sreedhar Perla

customer_reviews.title: Great goft
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my grandson he loves it. Easy to put together, and sturdy. I feel safe letting him ride this up and down the driveway.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old got it for Christmas and absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bike!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 6 and one of the tallest in his class. The bike is good for him now, but I think within a year we will have to get him another bike. Overall, it was a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous when the box came to assemble but a quick YouTube video and a small bike toolset it was easy and fun for the kids watching me put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Missing brakes - Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Its missing brakes. When i bought, it said it has brakes but they are missing in the box! And when i called amazon they are saying order brakes from amazon! This is ridiculous- pls dont buy this bike!
customer_reviews.author: M A

customer_reviews.title: First bike
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, affordable first bike for my grandchild. He leaves it at my house because I have good roads.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: terrible quality crap. please do not buy
customer_reviews.text: terrible quality crap. please do not buy. bike falls over and bends the training wheel so now one side is shorter than the other, my kid is riding it all crooked. cheap materials used on the seat. brakes rub against the wheels becuse some setting is probably off. terrible terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Jawad Rais

customer_reviews.title: Good bike
customer_reviews.text: Good bike for 5 year old, but the handle breaks are not only hard to pull he can't reach them what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Santa brought this for my son and I can't get him off it lol he loves it think you chose right santa he loves it
customer_reviews.author: alc

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: This bike seems to be of good quality so far. It has a solid build. The paint is cool, it looks better than in the pictures. My 5 year old can ride it easily. The only thing that was questionable was each handlebar grip is different, one rubbery and the other is smooth plastic.
customer_reviews.author: TillyFatCat

customer_reviews.title: Easy to ride
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it and it's easy for him to get on and off
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Super cool bike
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bike! My son loves and it looks so cool- love the colors! It’s a heavy sturdy bike which is great for a new rider! He’s 5 and it’s the perfect size for him
customer_reviews.author: NMN

customer_reviews.title: Hand brake not working
customer_reviews.text: We can’t get the front hand brake adjusted tight enough, despite reading the instructions and watching multiple you tube videos on this particular hand brake. It does nothing to even slow the bike down. We’re still trying and I’ll update if we can get it, but we’ve literally been working on it for 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BIKE, 6 YEAR OLD( SMALL FOR HIS AGE) ...
customer_reviews.text: GREAT BIKE, 6 YEAR OLD( SMALL FOR HIS AGE) LEARNED TO RIDE IT QUICKLY, AND THE VAROOM FEATURE WILL DRIVE HIS PARENTS OUT OF THEIR MIND, JUST LOVE TO GIVE THAT KIND OF GIFT. APPEARED TO BE WELL MADE.
customer_reviews.author: F. BALMER

customer_reviews.title: Great childs bike
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is 41/2 years old. This is his first bicycle. He stands about 40 inches tall. The 14 inch version we bought is perfect for him. He has no problem pedaling or steering. It is well built and Avery good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disapointment/missing part
customer_reviews.text: Arrived missing handle bar grip, training wheels, bells, streamers and bag. Disappointed that my only option is to return the WHOLE BIKE for just that.
customer_reviews.author: learn

customer_reviews.title: Damaged upon delivery!
customer_reviews.text: The front fork was bent straight out of the box, but the box was undamaged. I spent an hour on Christmas day muscling it straight. Could not avoid chipping the paint. Could not wait for replacement so had to fix it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Cohen

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bike for my 4 year old son. He is 48 inches tall, with an inseam of 17 inches. He fits this bike just perfectly and has a lot of room to grow. We have only had this bike for a week, but we haven't spent a day without riding it. My son loves the added car noise on the handlebar too. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frame seems sturdy, just wish other parts were better made
customer_reviews.text: The wheels on the bike were not true out of the box. They are not completely bent, but they are visibly warped. The switch on the toy throttle sticks in the one position, making for a lot of noise. Frame seems sturdy, just wish other parts were better made. The bike is usable, but I don't think I will be buying another one of these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: bmj10

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for red racecar fans
customer_reviews.text: Got this for grandson's 4th birthday. Perfect size and he loved the racecar theme, especially the sound effects
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Green

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The smile on my grandson's face when he saw the Box. Adorable bike and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mels

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to what is says
customer_reviews.text: Great price, great bike for my six year old and the tires were two tone in color. The handle that makes the noise works great. He loves the sound while riding his bike.
customer_reviews.author: Cristy Meringer

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bike for my grandson. Was leary about not seeing it before purchase. Great value. My grandson loves it. It was easy to put together and is very sturdy and durable. I'm sure this bike will last until he outgrows it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had this as a kid!
customer_reviews.text: The bike is really cool. Very sturdy and should last for years. The front brake was a little difficult to get to work right because it's loose so you can get the wheel on.
customer_reviews.author: Tim C.

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson absolutely loves this bike, and it's just what he needed. It's very sturdy to hold up to him.
customer_reviews.author: Robin J. Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Look for Another bike
customer_reviews.text: The pedals don't stay attached and the front brake doesn't hit the tire. Look for something else
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't even let the dumb neighbor kids ride it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheap piece of junk. Both wheels are not even close to straight. all bearings from the stem to the crank are junk. The chain is way too tight and binds even the rear sprocket isn't straight. Why buy a brand new bike to rebuild and fix every component? Paint is decent at least.
customer_reviews.author: Genkay

customer_reviews.title: My son absolutely loves this bike! He revs up ...
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this bike! He revs up the handle and just goes, goes, goes! It's so much cuter in person than in the picture! Definitely buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Zulkoski

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made product
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for our grandson so when it was being put together we found that the frame that the front tire attaches to was molded crooked and when we tried to straighten it up the frame bent. I would suggest not buying this low quality product. I am finding out that products from China are just getting worse.
customer_reviews.author: commander4506

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves this bike! He is 3 but pretty tall for his age but manages this bike with room to grow. Excellent quality. He loves the sound effect on the handle bar saying he is going "fast"'as it makes a rev noise. Great colors. Can't go wrong with this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Clifford

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS BIKE!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I should of listened to the reviews when other reviewers said that the bike falls apart easily. The chain already fell off and now its stuck and hooked onto the right pedal. SMH. And I bought this just a little over a month ago. Now i cant return this bike since the return window has already closed. DISAPPOINTED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool bike!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old loves his bike. the sound effects are his favorite. The seat is easy to adjust, training wheels are easy to remove. Loved how it came together.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my 4 year old son who loves hot wheels!
customer_reviews.author: Rose An Ferrer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for learners!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Bought for my 5 yr olds birthday. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my son. He loves it! His favorite part is the handlebar that he can rev to make the bike sound like a motorcycle.
customer_reviews.author: J. KING

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. For the price it is just right. With children growing so fast and needing bigger sizes almost yearly, this was perfect for a starter bike.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne R.

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: The only issue was the pedals. One of them had threading that was smooshed ans wouldn't screw on so had to buy some. But very nice looking bike. My son loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa

product_meta.title: Dynacraft Hot Wheels Boys BMX Street/Dirt Bike with Hand Brake
feature_bullets: Boys beginner BMX street/dirt bike with front hand, and rear coaster brakes
Handlebar shield with Hot Wheels graphics
Cool two-tone black and orange tires with red rims
Recommended Ages 4 to 8; up to 81 lbs.
